DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate antibody response three influenza vaccine strain include seasonal flu vaccine ( AdimFlu-S ) , measure hemagglutination inhibition ( HAI ) 4 week two dos study vaccine , 4 week apart , infant 6 12 month age .
DOC.brief_title: Immunogenicity Safety AdimFlu-S , Formulation 2010-2011 , Infants Aged Between 6-12months Old
